00099 
00101 
00110         void SetBaseLine(bool bAutomatic, double dBaseLine)
00111         {

00113                 m_dBaseLine = dBaseLine;
00114         }

00127         bool IsPointOnSerie(const CPoint& screenPoint, unsigned& uIndex) const;

00163         // axis for vertical bars). This offset is based on series with the
00164         // same group Id.

00178 
00179         // The base line specifies the position (in terms of the value
00180         // axis) where the bars start from. If m_bAutoBaseLine is true
00181         // they start from the axis position.
00182         double m_dBaseLine;
00183         bool m_bAutoBaseLine;
00184 
00185         // Specifies to which group this series belongs to. Series in the same group are
00186         // 'stacked' next to each other.
00187         unsigned m_uGroupId;            
00188 
00189         int m_iBarWidth;
00190         int m_iBorderWidth;

00192 
00193         bool m_bGradient;
00194         COLORREF m_GradientColor;
00195         EGradientType m_GradientType;
00196 
00197         // Specifies if the bar series has to be stacked with other bar 
00198         // series with the same group Id
00199         bool m_bStacked;
00200 
00201         // Cache of the stacked series with the same group Id as this series.
00202         mutable TBarSeriesList m_lstStackedSeries;
